name: Connecteam
tagline: Run Your Business - From Anywhere - At Anytime
description: Connecteam offers companies the easiest, fastest and most comprehensive way to manage deskless employees successfully for FREE. We know how challenging it is to manage a dispersed team and that's why we let you create your own fully branded mobile app within minutes. Manage collaborations, run operations, and develop professional skills using one tool from anywhere. Now your team can receive work orders, upload invoices, develop compliance in the field, use real-time chat, and much more.
